text: The system shall respond quickly to user requests.
The model shall achieve at least 90% accuracy on the test set.
The system should be user-friendly and intuitive.
Drift shall be detected if KS-statistic > 0.1 on any input feature.
The model shall classify images at a rate of at least 20 FPS on an NVIDIA T4 GPU.
The monitoring service shall trigger an alert when error rate exceeds 2% for more than 3 minutes.
